result.title: virtual contests important feature
result.content:
i think it will be great if when we finish a virtual contest we know how our rating( score ) would change , this feature has a lot of benefits 1- give new contestants confidence so that before competing in a ranked contest we can try ourselves and see how would our score change , this will be more virtual than just our rank on the contest (you are the 2000 on this contest but you don't know how would your score change )

2- if you left training for a while , you will need to warm up and test to make sure you are up to a real contest

Vote Up if you believe this will be a great feature ++

what do you think MikeMirzayanov ?
